Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-34064 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-34064 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-4, affected by CVE-2024-34064
